remarks: If the union of two classes/functions is a function, this union is finitely supported iff the two functions are finitely supported. (Contributed by AV, 18-Jun-2019.)
statement:
fsuppunbi.u $e |- ( ph -> Fun ( F u. G ) ) $.
fsuppunbi $p |- ( ph -> ( ( F u. G ) finSupp Z <-> ( F finSupp Z /\ G finSupp Z ) ) ) $.
